title: Female Voiceover Artist for Social Media Videos | ENG
job_overview:
We’re looking for a female voiceover artist to bring our video scripts to life. You’ll be reading and recording short scripts that will be used in social media content — mainly for Instagram Reels, TikToks, and other marketing videos.

What we need:

Clear, engaging, and confident voice

Comfortable recording short scripts (30–90 seconds)

Good pronunciation and natural delivery — conversational but polished

Ability to record with clean audio (home setup or studio-quality mic preferred)

Quick turnaround on recordings (2–3 days)

What you’ll do:

- Receive ready-to-read scripts from us
- Record voiceovers in your own setup
- Deliver clean audio files (mp3)
- Collaborate with our content team if adjustments are needed

To apply, fill out the form here:
> Upgrade to see actual info

Good luck!
